prompt: Design a feedback form with a futuristic theme, featuring a black background and neon green accents. Display a 'Feedback Portal' title at the top in a bold, sci-fi font. Include a glowing subtitle below. Arrange elements in a vertical stack: a name text field with neon green borders, an email field with validation and glowing focus, a dropdown for feedback type (Bug, Feature, General, Support) with neon styling, a multi-line text area for comments with a dark fill, and a 5-star rating system with neon green stars. Place a 'Transmit Feedback' button at the bottom with a neon green glow and black text. Use sharp edges, glowing effects, and tight spacing for a high-tech aesthetic.
